items.title: Create a culture of financial responsibility

items.title: Collect and review cost data
items.description: Data collection should capture daily costs. In cost reports, include incurred costs (metered), prepaid costs (amortized), trends, and forecasts. Stakeholders should regularly review spending against the budget and cost model. Automate alerts to trigger notifications at key thresholds and detect anomalies to indicate deviations from trend baselines.

guidance.recommendation: Collect and review cost data. Data collection should capture daily costs. In cost reports, include incurred costs (metered), prepaid costs (amortized), trends, and forecasts. items.title: Get the best rates from providers

items.title: Align usage to billing increments
items.description: You should understand billing increments (meters) and align resource usage to those increments. Consider using a proof-of-concept to validate billing knowledge and design choices for major cost drivers and to reveal ways to align billing and resource usage.

guidance.recommendation: Align usage to billing increments. You should understand billing increments (meters) and align resource usage to those increments. items.title: Optimize environment costs
